statements: SELECT * FROM resource_metrics WHERE server_id = 'abc123'
SELECT server_id, memory_utilization FROM resource_metrics ORDER BY memory_utilization DESC
SELECT server_id, cpu_utilization, timestamp FROM resource_metrics WHERE storage_utilization > 0.5
SELECT server_id, storage_utilization FROM resource_metrics WHERE cpu_utilization < 0.3
SELECT server_id, network_utilization, timestamp FROM resource_metrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00'
SELECT server_id, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization FROM resource_metrics WHERE cpu_utilization > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT server_id, network_utilization FROM resource_metrics WHERE network_utilization < 50 ORDER BY network_utilization ASC;
SELECT server_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage, storage_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE storage_usage > 70 AND memory_usage > 60 ORDER BY cpu_usage ASC;
SELECT server_id, network_throughput FROM performance_metrics WHERE network_throughput > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM resource_metrics JOIN performance_metrics ON resource_metrics.server_id = performance_metrics.server_id WHERE resource_metrics.cpu_utilization > 70 AND performance_metrics.cpu_usage < 50 ORDER BY resource_metrics.cpu_utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT resource_name, utilization, resource_type FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.9;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY resource_name ASC, utilization DESC;
SELECT id, resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value, MIN(metric_value) AS min_value FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name IN ('CPU', 'Memory') AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT resource_name, AVG(utilization) AS avg_utilization FROM resource_utilization GROUP BY resource_name HAVING AVG(utilization) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT resource_name, utilization_percentage FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization_percentage > 80;
SELECT id, metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_infrastructure WHERE region = 'us-east-1';
SELECT instance_id, region, status FROM cloud_infrastructure ORDER BY instance_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_type = 'CPU' ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC;
SELECT resource_name, utilization_percentage FROM resource_utilization WHERE utilization_percentage >= 80;
SELECT r.resource_name, p.metric_name, p.value FROM resource_utilization r JOIN performance_metrics p ON r.id = p.resource_id;
SELECT c.region, COUNT(c.id) as instance_count FROM cloud_infrastructure c GROUP BY c.region ORDER BY instance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%error%' AND value > 0 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resource_name, utilization_metric FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_type = 'CPU' ORDER BY utilization_metric DESC;
SELECT server_name, server_ip, location FROM cloud_infrastructure WHERE hardware_type = 'VM' ORDER BY server_name;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY metric_value DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT alert_message, alert_type FROM alert_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization;
SELECT timestamp, resource_name, utilization_metric FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_name, server_ip, location FROM cloud_infrastructure WHERE hardware_type = 'Virtual' ORDER BY server_name;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT alert_message, alert_type, timestamp FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_type = 'error' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_utilization WHERE usage_metric > 50;
SELECT * FROM resource_performance WHERE performance_metric < 0.5 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instance_id, instance_status, region FROM cloud_instances WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(usage_metric) AS avg_usage, MAX(usage_metric) AS max_usage, MIN(usage_metric) AS min_usage FROM resource_utilization WHERE resource_type='CPU';
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(a.alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM user_accounts u LEFT JOIN alerts a ON u.user_id = a.resource_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;

SELECT r.resource_name, r.usage_metric, p.performance_metric FROM resource_utilization r INNER JOIN resource_performance p ON r.id = p.resource_id WHERE r.usage_metric > 50 AND p.performance_metric < 0.5;

SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_message, r.resource_name, a.alert_date FROM alerts a INNER JOIN resource_utilization r ON a.resource_id = r.id WHERE r.resource_type='Storage' ORDER BY a.alert_date ASC LIMIT 5;
